title: Citrix Systems 3Q Adjusted EPS Beats Analysts Expectations
text:
By Michael Dabaie

Citrix Systems Inc. (CTXS) third-quarter adjusted earnings beat analysts expectations.

The information technology solutions company reported third-quarter earnings were $271 million, or earning per share of $2.04.

Adjusted EPS was $1.52, more than the company's guidance of $1.15 to $1.30 and beating FactSet consensus for $1.25.

The company said revenue was $733 million, which exceeded its guidance of $700 million to $720 million. Revenue was flat on year, the company said, as subscription revenue growth of 43% offset the decline of 23% in perpetual product and license revenue.

Shares were up 4% early, to $107.95.
